desc: Undergraduate students at Masters' Union can now study at global campuses like INSEAD & Columbia, the B-school announced, adding that the partnership will enable the UG students to take unique courses in France, US & Singapore.
10 students within its flagship INR 40 lakh UG programme will be given 100 % scholarships to nurture diverse talents and provide access to top-tier education.
asters Union, a business school based in Gurugram has released its audited placement report for the PGP (MBA) cohort of 2023.
Gurugram-based Masters Union, the new-age business school today released their audited placement report for their PGP (MBA) cohort of 2023.
Masters Union places its second cohort at an average CTC of INR 33.10 lakh
After stellar success in PGP Program, Masters' Union launches UG Program in Tech & Business Management
Masters' Union onboards Journalist Barkha Dutt as faculty.
Talks like an IIM, walks like an edtech: what exactly is Masters Union?
